import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import { BsArrow90DegLeft , BsFillBagPlusFill} from "react-icons/bs"; import './ItemDetailContainer.css'; import Items from '../ItemListContainer/data.json'; import { useParams ,useNavigate, Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState , useEffect } from 'react'; const ItemDetailContainer = (id , name, model,price,description,size) => { return(
{

{name} {model}

Añadir al carrito

Precio

$ {price}

Modelo

{model}

Descripción

{description}

Dimensiones

{size}

Regresar
}
); } export default ItemDetailContainer;
